snippet: The Jabberwocky imprint of Sourcebooks has acquired a book called "It Is About a Little Bird," written by Ms. Lange, the Oscar- and Emmy-winning star of "American Horror Story," and which will use photographs that she took and illustrated by hand.
abstract: The Jabberwocky imprint of Sourcebooks has acquired a book called "It Is About a Little Bird," written by Ms. Lange, the Oscar- and Emmy-winning star of "American Horror Story," and which will use photographs that she took and illustrated by hand.

headline.main: Children's Book Coming from Jessica Lange
headline.print_headline: Jessica Lange Writes and Illustrates A Storybook for Young Readers
